resources.string: next check for due birthdays on %1$s at %2$s

TKBirthdayReminder organizes birthdays. It adds them to your regular contacts databse. Consequently, to rename, add or delete an entry, switch to Contacts. Birthday dates, of course, are set or changed using TKBirthdayReminder. 
An easy to handle list shows the next birthdays and how old the persons become. Additionally, once a day the program reminds you if one or more of your contacts have birthday. To change the notification time, press the Menu button. 
If you have questions about the program or if you think you have found a bug, please contact me by sending an email to kuennetht@googlemail.com. If there is a problem, I will gladly be trying to solve it. However, I may need further information to track it down. Thank you very much for helping me improve TKBirthdayReminder.
